Foto: Tradisi Unik Itu Bernama Tawurji
02 Nov 2019, 08:10 by Sudirman Wamad



Inilah Tawurji, tradisi unik rebutan uang koin dari Cirebon. Tradisi ini masih berlangsung di Keraton Kanoman Cirebon (Sudirman/detikcom)



"Ji tawur ji, tawur. Selamat dawa umur. Tawurji!," Keluarga Keraton Kanoman Cirebon langsung melempar koin usai menyanyikan sepenggal bait tersebut. (Sudirman/detikcom)



Masyarakat yang tengah berkumpul di depan Bangsal Jinem Keraton Kanoman Cirebon langsung berebut koin. Mereka rela saling dorong, merangkak demi uang koin. (Sudirman/detikcom)



Tradisi Tawurji merupakan media sedekah keluarga keraton Cirebon. Tradisi Tawurji lahir dari rahim rasa saling gotong royong (Sudirman/detikcom)



Tradisi Tawurji selalu dilakukan pada Rabu terakhir bulan Safar. Selain Tawurji, Keraton Kanoman juga menggelar tradisi Ngapem. Keluarga keraton membuat kue apem yang kemudian dibagikan ke masyarakat. (Sudirman/detikcom)


Cirebon - Di Cirebon, ada sebuah tradisi unik bernama Tawurji. Ratusan orang rela saling dorong hingga merangkak demi rebutan uang koin. Seperti apa?

Photo: Unique Tradition Named Tawurji
02 Nov 2019, 08:10 by Sudirman Wamad



This is Tawurji, a unique tradition of fighting for coins from Cirebon. This tradition is still ongoing at the Kanoman Palace in Cirebon (Sudirman / detikcom)



"Ji tawur ji, brawl. Good old age. Tawurji!" The Kanoman Cirebon Royal Family immediately threw a coin after singing a piece of the temple. (Sudirman / detikcom)



People who were gathered in front of the Jinem Ward of the Kanoman Palace in Cirebon immediately fought for coins. They are willing to push each other, crawling for coins. (Sudirman / detikcom)



The Tawurji tradition is a media donation from the Cirebon royal family. The Tawurji tradition was born from the womb of mutual cooperation (Sudirman / detikcom)



The Tawurji tradition is always performed on the last Wednesday of the Safar month. Besides Tawurji, Kanoman Palace also held Ngapem tradition. The royal family made apem cakes which were then distributed to the community. (Sudirman / detikcom)


Cirebon - In Cirebon, there is a unique tradition called Tawurji. Hundreds of people are willing to push each other to crawl for the struggle for coins. Like what?
